New Records: Michael Jokic moved within three triple-doubles of tying Magic Johnson for third place on the all-time triple-doubles list
Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 37 points, 18 rebounds, and 15 assists
Pre-Game Insights: Michael Malone joked about Jokic's low spot in the MVP race
Post-Match Reflections: Michael Malone called Jokic the best player in the world
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jokic's teammate, Michael Porter Jr., expressed awe at Jokic's consistent performances
Others: Jokic's teammates have noticed his dedication to taking care of his body off the court
